stories.Title: Here comes Gemini
stories.Description: After months of anticipation and a minor launch delay, Google has enlightened us with a glimpse of its upcoming AI model, Gemini. Coming in three tiers, it is set to outshine GPT-4's capabilities.
stories.Tweet: Here comes Gemini 📦 After months of anticipation and a minor launch delay, Google has enlightened us with a glimpse of its upcoming AI model, Gemini. Coming in three tiers, it is set to outshine GPT-4's capabilities. #google https://gizmodo.com/google-launches-gemini-ai-bard-pixel-8-preview-1851076747

stories.Title: Bing gets deep
stories.Description: Having trouble finding the right search engine results? Microsoft's got your back with Bing's new "Deep Search," powered by GPT-4, offering more insightful answers to the most intricate queries.
stories.Tweet: Bing gets deep 📦 Having trouble finding the right search engine results? Microsoft's got your back with Bing's new "Deep Search," powered by GPT-4, offering more insightful answers to the most intricate queries. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/12/05/microsoft-bings-deep-search-offers-more-comprehensive-answers-complex-search-queries-gpt-4/

stories.Title: Chips and Hypercomputers
stories.Description: Google's AI roadmap takes a giant leap forward with Cloud TPU V5p and the introduction of an AI Hypercomputer. Two announcements that reflect the rising demand for advanced AI training.
stories.Tweet: Chips and Hypercomputers 📦 Google's AI roadmap takes a giant leap forward with Cloud TPU V5p and the introduction of an AI Hypercomputer. Two announcements that reflect the rising demand for advanced AI training. #google https://www.engadget.com/google-announces-new-ai-processing-chips-and-a-cloud-hypercomputer-150031454.html

stories.Title: Everywhere at once
stories.Description: Gemini's grand entrance promises a revolution across Google's entire product lineup. From Android—starting with the Pixel 8 Pro—to Bard, which will be powered by a larger version of the model.
stories.Tweet: Everywhere at once 📦 Gemini's grand entrance promises a revolution across Google's entire product lineup. From Android—starting with the Pixel 8 Pro—to Bard, which will be powered by a larger version of the model. #google https://www.engadget.com/googles-gemini-ai-is-coming-to-android-150025984.html

stories.Title: Your digital guide
stories.Description: As AI transforms lunar exploration, NASA's VIPER rover, guided by the SHERPA AI system, readies for a groundbreaking mission to the Moon's south pole, enhancing navigation on its surface.
stories.Tweet: Your digital guide 📦 As AI transforms lunar exploration, NASA's VIPER rover, guided by the SHERPA AI system, readies for a groundbreaking mission to the Moon's south pole, enhancing navigation on its surface. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/ai-sherpa-nasa-viper-rover-moons

stories.Title: A leap into the unknown
stories.Description: ESA and Airbus are prepping Ariel, a spacecraft ready to embark on an ambitious exoplanet study mission. Slated for 2029, it aims to uncover the atmospheric composition of over 1000 exoplanets.
stories.Tweet: A leap into the unknown 📦 ESA and Airbus are prepping Ariel, a spacecraft ready to embark on an ambitious exoplanet study mission. Slated for 2029, it aims to uncover the atmospheric composition of over 1000 exoplanets. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/science/ariel-esa-airbus-1000-exoplanets

stories.Title: The best partner
stories.Description: When challenges arise, SpaceX stands as a reliable ally. Capella Space has recently partnered with the company for rideshare missions in 2024 after an Electron launch failure.
stories.Tweet: The best partner 📦 When challenges arise, SpaceX stands as a reliable ally. Capella Space has recently partnered with the company for rideshare missions in 2024 after an Electron launch failure. #spacex https://spacenews.com/capella-to-use-spacex-for-two-acadia-satellite-launches/

stories.Title: In the quest for alien life
stories.Description: Breaking through the icy crusts of the moons around Jupiter and Saturn is not an easy task. This is where the cryobot comes in—a proposed probe that could unveil the secrets of alien oceans.
stories.Tweet: In the quest for alien life 📦 Breaking through the icy crusts of the moons around Jupiter and Saturn is not an easy task. This is where the cryobot comes in—a proposed probe that could unveil the secrets of alien oceans. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/nasa-shows-off-concept-for-an-alien-hunting-cryobot-pro-1851074827

stories.Title: Some financial twists
stories.Description: Richard Branson announced his decision to halt further investments in Virgin Galactic, citing financial constraints post-COVID. Luckily, the company has obtained enough funds to keep working.
stories.Tweet: Some financial twists 📦 Richard Branson announced his decision to halt further investments in Virgin Galactic, citing financial constraints post-COVID. Luckily, the company has obtained enough funds to keep working. #virgingalactic https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/virgin-galactic-to-lose-funding-from-its-billionaire-founder/

stories.Title: The affordable version
stories.Description: According to CEO Elon Musk, the upcoming low-cost Tesla is in the advanced stages of development, showcasing the success of breakthrough manufacturing techniques.
stories.Tweet: The affordable version 📦 According to CEO Elon Musk, the upcoming low-cost Tesla is in the advanced stages of development, showcasing the success of breakthrough manufacturing techniques. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/12/05/elon-musk-low-cost-tesla-advanced-manufacturing-revolutionary/

title: Meet the Cryobot, The Gemini revolution, Bing's enhanced search
description: The quest for alien life is ongoing, even if it's hiding in cosmic oceans far, far away. That's not stopping NASA from designing a probe to explore them. Google just dropped a sneak peek of Gemini's powers, and as expected, they plan to spread its magic across all their products. Lastly, if you're into crafting complex queries that make search engines go 'Huh?' — Bing is calling your name.
